author: Ben Brown
title: After New York, Here’s The Next U.S. Coronavirus Hotspot
description: Florida will soon become the epicenter of the world's coronavirus pandemic, according to former FDA comissioner Scott Gottlieb. The post After New York, Here’s The Next U.S. Coronavirus Hotspot appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• New York is the epicentre of the coronavirus pandemic with more cases in one state than all mainland China.
  • The virus will spread and evolve across the U.S. in the coming months, creating new hot spots along the way.
